thread.title: Kevin McSherry
thread.title_full: SIP Scootershop bewertet von Kevin McSherry

author: Kevin McSherry
title: Kevin McSherry
text: Excellent service made too expensive by the minimum spend. In order to get a replacement seat strap worth €12 delivered to Ireland, I had to spend a minimum of €80, (I think it was) buying stuff I didn't budget for. The service is great but I couldn't justify doing this again.
